Articles.Content: Does anyone have any good basic rover designs im only new and need help.
The stock skycrane+rover design is a good starting point.
Is there a way to put the rover on a rocket that I have already made on a different save?
Unless you can edit the save file, sadly no, unless you are willing to rebuild.

Is there a way to put the rover on a rocket that I have already made on a different save?

This mod combines 2 crafts in one, not sure if it is still compatible. And there is subassembly mod too
Does anyone have any easy to make rover designs?
Here are some designs, though I have not tested them extensively in .21. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/35916-Small-Medium-and-Large-moon-rovers-from-Yeahletstrythatdyne
thanks and is it possible to put a flag on the planet or moon that you land on?
yup! just click on your kerbalnaut as if you are trying to select him as a target or a control from here action, you will see: Plant Flag

If you're looking for something simple and small you can check this out:

http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/b/441088019 at 15:15 I decouple it to drive it around. It's pretty stable, and has room for 1 Kerbal to ride around on.

You could probably lower it a bit more to make it even more stable, and another RTG or a couple more solar panels.
